title: LARP Night on Union Station
description: Start the EarthCent Ambassador series with the three book bundle, Union Station 1, 2, 3.  While Kelly struggles to come up with a research project to apply for sabbatical, the role-playing craze reaches Union Station, and the Open University offers a for-credit LARP. Dorothy finally finishes her wedding dress with a technical flourish, and Jeeves plots to recoup his costs.
author: E.M. Foner
